introduction.p0: With over 15 years of experience in software engineering and release management, I am skilled in leading cross-functional teams and resolving complex issues.
introduction.p1: My journey began with a Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Systems & Networks from the Belarusian State University of Informatics and Radioelectronics, which laid the foundation for my technical expertise.
introduction.p2: Later at EPAM Systems, I led teams to deliver projects for global clients, enhancing my leadership and project management skills. My role as a Senior Release Manager at MongoDB allowed me to collaborate with diverse teams to streamline release processes and improve efficiency.
introduction.p3: I take pride in mentoring colleagues, fostering a culture of continuous improvement, and achieving significant reductions in release rollbacks. My passion lies in applying my expertise to support both startup and enterprise application development. I am eager to share my knowledge and experience to inspire and guide others in their professional journeys.
